com.tradersgem2.lists

Class StockListAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • BaseAdapter
      • com.tradersgem2.lists.StockListAdapter

  • public class StockListAdapter
extends BaseAdapter
    This class manages the adaptation and indirect implementation of the stock list view; It's look and color definition are made through this class
    Author:
    Luiz + Pedro
